body_html: Did not check performance of reductions, but changes are expected to slightly improve performance, if anything. With the old code the compiler was generating unnecessary instructions for each thread to independently zero the shared memory region.
body_text: Did not check performance of reductions, but changes are expected to slightly improve performance, if anything. With the old code the compiler was generating unnecessary instructions for each thread to independently zero the shared memory region.
body: Did not check performance of reductions, but changes are expected to slightly improve performance, if anything. With the old code the compiler was generating unnecessary instructions for each thread to independently zero the shared memory region.
